sections.content:
New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
ciste x1 is a system with components x2 and structure x3 system
frica x1 differs from x2 in property x3 differ/different

Sumti vs Selbri Connectives

Type Connects Example
Sumti (.e, .a) Arguments mi .e do
Selbri (je, ja) Predicates barda je melbi

Using je (And)

lo gerku cu barda je melbi

The dog is big and beautiful.

la .alis. cu ninmu je clani

Alice is female and tall.

Using ja (Or)

lo gerku cu barda ja cmalu

The dog is big or small (or both).

mi klama ja stali

I go or stay (or both).

Complete Selbri Connectives

Cmavo Meaning
je and
ja or
jo iff
ju whether or not

Key Point

Selbri connectives (je, ja) connect predicates. They describe multiple properties of the same sumti.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use je

Translate:

  1. The cat is small and fast.
  2. Alice is beautiful and happy.
  3. The book is old and red.
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu cmalu je sutra
  2. la .alis. cu melbi je gleki
  3. lo cukta cu slabu je xunre

Exercise 2: Use ja

Translate:

  1. The dog is big or small.
  2. I go or stay.
  3. It is good or bad.
Answers
  1. lo gerku cu barda ja cmalu
  2. mi klama ja stali
  3. ri xamgu ja xlali

Exercise 3: New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This is a system.
  2. Alice differs from Bob.
  3. The systems are different.
Answers
  1. ti ciste
  2. la .alis. cu frica la .bob.
  3. lo ciste cu frica

items.text: The cat is small and fast.
The book is old and red.
The dog is big or small.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "The dog is big and blue." → lo gerku cu barda je blanu
  2. "I work or rest." → mi gunka ja surla
  3. "This is a system." → ti ciste

Summary

You learned selbri connectives je and ja to connect predicates. Use these to describe multiple properties of the same thing.
